message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I believe its worth extends far beyond what meets the eye, and I am eager to share this exceptional piece with someone who appreciates its true essence. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the return on my investment. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests. Please let me know your thoughts on this matter, and we can proceed accordingly.
